ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class
ygData.msgSnippet: By best , I mean one that will level easy, do a lot of damage and be able to group well. I don t care about the ability to solo or take a lot of damage, just
ygData.messageBody:
By "best", I mean one that will level easy, do a lot of damage and be able to group well. I don't care about the ability to solo or take a lot of damage, just dealing it.
 
Denis
 

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)

Mu

Subject: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class


I'm thinking about putting my Human Warrior on the back burner for a while
and trying something new. Can anyone recommend the best melee class/type? I
was looking at an Iksar or a High Elf, but I'm not sure.
